game.name: Space Station: Beyond
game.genres: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Play as a variety of creatures or characters and try to survive either maintaining or attacking a space station while everything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as a variety of creatures or characters and try to survive either maintaining or attacking a space station while everything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.

reviewHighlights.text: Much better than "official" Space Station 14 launcher, in all regards.
Space Station 14 has needed support for decentralized authentication for years, I'm glad the open hub is finally fully released. Thanks for all the ha...
